StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdatePersonnelAssignmentAndBillet]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID as integer, @Organiza.onID as integer, @Recrui.ngRoleID as varchar(2), --@TourBeginDate as date.me, --@BilletBeginDate as date.me, @UserLogin as varchar(15), @CurrentBilletEndDate as date.me, @NewBilletBeginDate as date.me AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128) SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
DECLARE @BeginDate date.me DECLARE @ShortDescrip.on varchar(15) DECLARE @MaxBilletBeginDate date.me DECLARE @MaxBilletEndDate date.me
SELECT @MaxBilletBeginDate = MAX(BILLET_BEGIN_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
SELECT @MaxBilletEndDate = MAX(BILLET_END_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
Select @BeginDate = Tour_Begin_Date From Recrui.ng_Person Where Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
Select @ShortDescrip.on = rr.Short_Descrip.on From Recrui.ng_Person rp, Recrui.ng_Role rr Where rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId and rp.Recrui.ng_Role_id = rr.Recrui.ng_Role_Id
EXEC USMC.InsertRecruiterHistory @PersonId = @PersonId, @BeginDate = @BeginDate, @BilletEndDate = @CurrentBilletEndDate, @ShortDescrip.on = @ShortDescrip.on, @UserLogin = @UserLogin
IF(DATEDIFF(DAY,@CurrentBilletEndDate, @NewBilletBeginDate) > 1) BEGIN Insert Into Recruiter_History( Recrui.ng_Person_Id, E.ec.ve_Date, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date, Billet_Desc, HQ_Name, Region_Name, District_Name, RS_Name, RSS_Name, Organiza.on_Type, User_Login, Update_Date )
SELECT TOP 1 Recrui.ng_Person_Id, DATEADD(day,1,@CurrentBilletEndDate), DATEADD(day,1,@CurrentBilletEndDate), DATEADD(day,-1,@NewBilletBeginDate), 'Other', HQ_Name, Region_Name, District_Name, RS_Name, RSS_Name, Organiza.on_Type, User_Login, getdate() FROM dbo.RECRUITER_HISTORY WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=@PersonID ORDER BY BILLET_BEGIN_DATE DESC
END
UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRoleID, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE = @NewBilletBeginDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Remove this recruiter from sector assignments ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID = rowguid FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=@PersonID
DECLARE @USER_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT TOP(1) @USER_GUID = [UserID] FROM [UserMgmt].[dbo].[User] WHERE [Username] like @UserLogin + '%' AND [IsAc.ve] = 1 ORDER BY [LastAc.vityDate] DESC
IF @USER_GUID = null BEGIN SET @USER_GUID = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' END
EXEC [RSSOSS].[USMC].[InsertUpdateMapsSectorRecruiter] @SectorRecruiterId = null, @SectorID = null, @Recrui.ngPersonId = @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID, @LastUpdateUserId = @USER_GUID ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SET NOCOUNT OFF
